current_contact.agency: Washoe Cnty Med Exam Coroners Ofc

case_address_found_1: Sheep Flats area, South of Mt. Rose HWY
case_circumstances: On 07/17/1982 at approximately 1330 hours, hikers found the decedent on the East side of Sheep Flats, south of Mt. Rose Highway.  She was found lying prone on the ground with defects to the back of her head.  Mens underwear had been used to cover the defects.  She was clad except for being barefoot.  Her livor mortis was still blanching when she was found.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_on_body: A blue Buntees Sportswear" t-shirt, size M, with bottom that had been cut away, blue Levi jeans, blue one-piece bathing suit
case_clothing_with_body: Light blue bikini underwear or bathing suit bottom found in front jeans pocket
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
